column4: Question one: Ubuntu 6.06 is named Edgy? Q2: (if Q1=yes) Would Ubuntu Edgy work just as well (in this case, better) than Feisty does for a newbie?
Problem with Feisty is that it doesn't play well at all with my wireless card (RTL8185 from Realtek) and fixing the problem is a little complicated, though doable. :x
try edgy then if it worked in edgy
